mansionBandit.network
Class Server

java.lang.Object
  mansionBandit.network.Server

public final class Server
extends java.lang.Object

The Server receives updates from clients via a socket. This updates the Server's version of the game, and these updates are sent to all clients.

Author:
Shreyas

Nested Class Summary
 class Server.ClientThread
          Represents a Thread that will run for each of the clients connected to the server.

 void sendChatMessage(java.lang.String message)

 void start()

Method Detail

start

public void start()
Sets up the ServerSocket and enters a loop where it awaits connections. Upon a successful connection, the Client is added to a list.

stop

public void stop()
Sets the boolean end to true which will exit the main while loop and close all the sockets.

stopLobby

public void stopLobby()
Similar to stop(), but works in a game lobby

serverSendItems

public void serverSendItems()
Locally updates the server's Item lists and then broadcasts the changes out to all the clients.

sendChatMessage

public void sendChatMessage(java.lang.String message)
Updates the Server's chat panel then broadcasts the message to the clients.

Parameters:
message - The string to be sent.

broadcast

public void broadcast(Message msg)
Used for iterating the list of clients and sending them each a message.

Parameters:
msg - The message to be sent to all clients.

remove

public void remove(Server.ClientThread ct)
Removes a specific ClientThread from the list.

Parameters:
ct - The ClientThread to be removed.
